name: Ronja
description:
Made for Mini Jam 29: Ninjas

Theme: Ninjas

Limitations: No combat

A platforming game based around a grappling hook and dashing around. 

Controls (keyboard or gamepad):

  • Hold Space (gamepad: A) to shoot your grappling hook
  • Aim your dash with WASD (or joystick)
  • Release Space/A to dash

Tips:

  • You can dash while hanging from a rope, standing on a floor or sticking to a wall
  • While hanging from a rope you can slightly influence your movement to the left and right

Tools and assets used:

  • Unity
  • Music - Cartoon Battle by Kevin MacLeod licensed under CC 3.0 BY
  • Gong icon - Freepik from www.flaticon.com licensed under CC 3.0 BY
  • Gong sound - GowlerMusic licensed under CC 3.0 BY
  • Other sounds generated by sfxr
  • DOTween
  • LeanPool
